imagenes.descripcion: The DEWALT 20V MAX cutting tool (DCS438B) is a 3-in-1 power tool designed for cutting difficult materials. It is brushless, which means it runs cooler and more efficiently. It has a built-in LED work light, useful for working in low light conditions. This is a tool-only product, which means no battery or charger is included.

The DIY professional Chinese Chinese power tool set includes a power wrench, water gun, power saw, angle grinder and electric hammer drill. Each tool has its own unique capabilities for a variety of tasks.

The 12V/24V 125mm Chinese 5-speed electric tile trowel is a power tool designed for tiling tasks. It operates at 5 different speeds, allowing you to adjust the speed according to your specific needs. This machine also features a vibrating suction mechanism, which can help ensure that tiles are laid evenly and securely. The tool is equipped with an LED light, which can be useful when working in low light conditions. It is designed to work with ceramic tiles, which makes it a great choice for both professional contractors and do-it-yourselfers.

Brush kit for Dremel style rotary power tools is a handy accessory that can enhance the versatility of your rotary tool. This kit typically includes a planer attachment that can be used to trim material from a workpiece. It is ideal for tasks such as trimming door edges, planing wood for a better fit or even creating decorative effects in woodworking. The planer attachment is designed to be compatible with Dremel-type rotary tools, which are known for their high speed and precision. This makes it a useful addition to your tool collection if you frequently work with wood or other materials that need to be planed.

The Milwaukee 2695-24 M18 is a power tool kit that includes a hammer drill, impact driver, reciprocating saw and work light. Also included are two batteries, a charger and a tool box. All tools are part of the Milwaukee M18 system, which means they are powered by the same 18V battery for convenience and efficiency.

The hot air plastic welding gun is a hand tool designed for plastic welding applications. It uses hot air to melt the plastic, allowing you to join parts or repair damaged areas. This tool is especially useful for working with high-density polyethylene geomembrane, PVC flooring, tarps, tents and car bumpers. The heat gun works by blowing hot air at a controlled temperature, which can be adjusted according to the specific requirements of the task at hand. This makes it a versatile tool for a wide variety of plastic welding applications.

Rechargeable Electric Floor Cleaner for Bathtubs and Tiles. It is a cordless cleaning tool designed to make the task of cleaning your bathroom and floors easier and more efficient. It features a telescoping handle that can be adjusted to your needs, making it easy to access high or low areas without straining your back. This Chinese tool also comes with three replaceable brush heads, allowing you to choose the most suitable one for the task at hand. Whether you're scrubbing tiles, cleaning the bathtub or mopping the floor, this tool can handle it all. Being rechargeable, it offers the convenience of cordless operation, which means you won't be limited by a power cord while cleaning. This can make it easier to move around and clean different areas of your home.

The biscuit board joiner kit for wood is a tool designed to create strong, reliable joints in woodworking projects. It uses small oval pieces of compressed wood, known as cookies, which are inserted into grooves cut into the pieces of wood you are joining. This kit includes 100 wood cookies, allowing you to get started on your woodworking projects right away. The cookie joiner itself is designed to cut the correct size slots for the cookies, ensuring a perfect fit that, when glued, creates a strong bond between the wood pieces.

The VEVOR woodworking bench lathe is a compact yet powerful tool designed for woodworking. It is 10 x 18 in size and has a 0.5 hp, 370 W motor, making it suitable for a wide variety of woodturning projects. One of the key features of this lathe is its variable speed control, which offers 5 different speeds (780/1320/1920/2640/3840 RPM). This allows you to adjust the speed of the lathe to suit your specific project requirements, whether you are working with different types of wood or making different types of cuts. The lathe also comes with bar injection keys, a faceplate and foot pads, providing you with everything you need to get started with your woodworking projects.

The HAowosi cable stripper, made of aluminum alloy, is lightweight and easy to carry. It has a 25W motor for stripping 0.04-0.79 diameter wires. The 65mn spring steel blades ensure efficient stripping. Extra blades and wrenches are included for easy replacement. Suitable for all types of cables, for both domestic and industrial use.

The SuperHandy concrete vibration tool is a cordless tool with a 48V 2Ah battery and brushless motor. It operates at 13k VPM and comes with a 4.9 ft. flexible immersion hose. This tool is designed to remove air bubbles, level and mix concrete, making it ideal for construction and renovation jobs.

The DEWALT 20V MAX* XR (DCH133B) rotary hammer drill is a powerful and versatile tool. It features a D-handle and is capable of handling drill bits up to 1 inch. This model is sold as a stand-alone, meaning the battery and charger are sold separately. It is part of DEWALT's 20V MAX* line, known for its durability and performance.

The DEWALT 20V MAX SDS rotary hammer drill (DCH273B) is a cordless tool that offers three application modes. This model is sold alone, which means the battery and charger are sold separately. It is part of DEWALT's 20V MAX line, known for its durability and performance.

The KSEIBI electric demolition hammer with 1-1/8 hex is a powerful tool for demolishing concrete. This model comes with a carrying case and operates at 15 AMP. It is ideal for construction and renovation jobs that require demolition of concrete structures.

The BOSCH DH1020VC in-line demolition hammer is a robust and efficient tool for demolition work. This model is blue in color, which is characteristic of BOSCH tools. It is ideal for construction and renovation jobs that require the demolition of concrete structures.

The YESWELDER Gas Gasless 160A multi-process MIG welder is a 4-in-1 welding machine that can handle Flux Cored, MIG, Lift TIG and Stick ARC. With synergic control and dual 110V/220V voltage, this welder offers versatility and control for a variety of welding jobs.

The Metabo HPT 7-inch 15-amp angle grinder (G18ST) is a powerful and durable tool for a variety of grinding jobs. This model is known for its performance and durability, making it ideal for construction and renovation jobs.

The Berserker 36V 7-inch cordless angle grinder is a powerful tool with a brushless motor. It comes with 2 x 4.0Ah lithium-ion batteries and a charger. This heavy duty cutting grinder is ideal for cutting and grinding metal and wood.

The BOSCH GWS12V-30N is a 12V Max 3 in. brushless angle grinder. It is a bare tool, meaning it comes without a battery or charger. This tool is part of Bosch's 12V system, which is designed to provide professional-grade power in a compact, lightweight design. The grinder features a brushless motor that provides longer run time and more power than a brushed motor. It is designed for a wide variety of applications, such as cutting, grinding and sanding.

The Vacmaster VDK611PF 0201 is a 6 gallon wet/dry vacuum with a filter cleaning system. This vacuum is designed for both wet and dry pick-up, making it versatile for a variety of cleaning tasks. The 6-gallon capacity allows for extended use without the need to empty the tank frequently. One of the key features of this model is its filter cleaning system, which helps maintain suction power and prolongs filter life.

The LeuMuas dust collector is a powerful and efficient dust collection system designed for woodworking. It features a 1HP induction motor that provides a strong 600CFM (cubic feet per minute) of suction power. This wall-mounted unit is designed to save space in your shop while providing efficient dust collection. The system includes a 13-gallon dust collection bag, which is large enough to handle major woodworking projects without frequent emptying. The induction motor ensures longer life and less maintenance compared to universal motors.

The XtremepowerUS 16 gas-powered cutter is a versatile tool designed for cutting wet and dry concrete. It is powered by a 52CC 2-stroke engine, which provides ample power for most cutting tasks. One of the most outstanding features of this cutter is its waterline guide roller. This feature helps ensure straight cuts and reduces dust when cutting, which can be particularly useful when working with concrete. The saw comes with a blade, so you'll have everything you need to get started.

The Evolution Power Tools R185SMS+ is a 7-1/4 multi-material miter saw. This saw is designed to cut a variety of materials, making it a versatile addition to any shop. The sliding feature allows for larger cuts, while the compound feature allows for cuts at a variety of angles. WEN's MSA330 is a folding miter saw stand with 3 built-in outlets. This stand is designed to support your miter saw, providing a stable work surface. The foldable design makes it easy to transport and store, while the integrated outlets allow you to plug your tools directly into the stand.

The PROSHI 3-inch pneumatic cutting tool is a high-speed pneumatic cutter designed for a variety of cutting tasks. It comes with a 3-inch cut-off wheel for immediate use. One of the key features of this tool is its 180-degree guard, which provides protection during use. As a pneumatic tool, it runs on compressed air, making it a good choice for applications where electrical power may not be available or safe.
